standard.description: These tests run against the DB objects and therefore may be hard to associate with a given application. They can be associated with the Application Standards Tracker app.

test.query_clob:
with  declared_ids  
            as (select object_name  
                  , object_type  
                  , name
                  , type
                  , signature
                  , line
								  , owner
                  from v_user_identifiers
                  where usage = 'DECLARATION'
                  and type in ('VARIABLE', 'EXCEPTION','CONSTANT')
                  and implicit = 'NO'
                  and object_name not like 'XXX%'
                  and name not in ('C_LIMIT','GC_Y','GC_N')
                  ),  
      used_ids
            as (select signature, line
                  from v_user_identifiers
                  where usage in ('REFERENCE','ASSIGNMENT')
               ),
      intersct as (
            select di.signature, count(*) it_count
            from declared_ids di 
            inner join used_ids ui on di.signature = ui.signature
                                   and di.line    != ui.line
            group by di.signature
      )
select 
case when it.signature is null
     then 'N'
		 else 'Y'
     end as pass_yn,
di.object_name, 
di.object_type, 
apex_string.format('Unused variable %0 should be dropped (in %1)',di.name, di.object_name) code, 
di.type,
di.line,
to_char(di.signature) unqid,
di.owner schema
from declared_ids di
left join intersct it on  di.signature = it.signature
test.explanation: This identifier has been declared but is not referenced anywhere.
test.fix: Remove the identifier or use it
